item.title: Basin and Range
item.description: From Rhapsodist of Deep Time, Paul Zweig, the New York Times Archives: This stretching and folding of language, by which the geologist does to words what endless eons have done to his rocks, excites Mr.

item.title: The Dawn of Everything
item.description: Reading nonfiction like fiction Definitely not the binary of Rousseau vs. Hobbes Thereâ€™s a lot of repetition and rambling, but the gist is: ask better questions.
